lead_paragraph: A “Slap Shots” note with an article last Sunday about the Flyers’ 4-2 victory against the Rangers misidentified an N.H.L. player who has called for a rule that fights be stopped when a player’s helmet comes off. He is Georges Laraque of the Montreal Canadiens, not Donald Brashear of the Washington Capitals.
